scripts.reset-db: npm run generate && npx prisma db push --force-reset && npm run seed
scripts.reset-generate: npm run reset-db && npm run generate-cs
scripts.generate-cs: cd .. && dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold "server=localhost;port=3306;database=ganda-yarn;uid=admin;password=admin" Pomelo.EntityFrameworkCore.MySql --context-dir DbContext --context GandaYarnDatabaseContext --output-dir Models --force
